pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid (2016, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft True Brave's $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_truebrave)Gamer Driver (True Brave)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access $(l:ex_aid/riders/brave#legacy)Legacy Gamer Level 100$(/l)
